title: Lifting the 10 Million hardcap
body:
We should not lift the cap for its own sake or this will just continue indefinitely. 

Only reason to lift the cap is if we have a selection of products to invest in like vaults or yieldwars style game etc.., where participants can use DRC invest or play and pay fees. 

Right now we have zero products out side of the Victim stake model which is not enough to lift the cap as we would be back here in a few weeks time lifting the cap again! Not good!
choices: Only lift 10 M cap if we have other products available
author: 0xe5df77b5c1C541cDA961bAFBdaB2b9FB94831f98
